mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(style_no, #{length1}) AS UNSIGNED)) AS max_serial_number FROM t_style_color WHERE style_no LIKE concat(#{styleNo}, '%')
SELECT ssc.style_no, sd.brand, sd.brand_name, sd.year, sd.year_name, sd.season, sd.season_name FROM t_style_color ssc LEFT JOIN t_style sd on ssc.style_id = sd.id where ssc.id = #{styleColorId}

select tsc.*, CASE WHEN tsc.is_trim = '0' THEN tsma.style_no ELSE '' END as accessoryNo, CASE WHEN tsc.is_trim = '0' THEN tsma.color_name ELSE'' END as accessory1, CASE WHEN tsc.is_trim = '0' THEN ''ELSE tsma.style_no END as principalStyleNo, CASE WHEN tsc.is_trim = '0' THEN ''ELSE tsma.color_name END as principalStyle, if(tsc.color_crash is null or tsc.color_crash = '', ts.color_crash, tsc.color_crash) as colorCrash, tpi.id packInfoId, tpi.name infoName, ts.task_level, ts.task_level_name, ts.style_type, ts.style_type_name, ts.size_range, ts.size_range_name, ts.merch_design_name, ts.pattern_design_name, ts.id styleId, ts.style_pic, ts.design_no designNo, ts.prod_category1st, ts.prod_category1st_name, ts.prod_category, ts.prod_category_name, ts.his_design_no, ts.style_name, ts.designer_id, ts.designer, ts.technician_id, ts.technician_name, ts.brand, ts.brand_name, ts.year, ts.year_name, ts.season, ts.season_name, ts.prod_category2nd_name, ts.prod_category2nd, ts.prod_category3rd, ts.prod_category3rd_name, tsp.control_confirm, tsp.product_hangtag_confirm, tsp.control_hangtag_confirm, ts.devt_type as devtType, ts.devt_type_name as devtTypeName, concat(tsc.ware_code,tsc.color_code,tbs.sort) as defaultBarCode FROM t_style_color tsc LEFT JOIN t_style ts ON ts.id = tsc.style_id
LEFT JOIN t_pack_info tpi on tpi.style_color_id = tsc.id LEFT JOIN t_style_pricing tsp on tsp.pack_id = tpi.id left join (SELECT style_color_id ,GROUP_CONCAT(style_no) style_no ,GROUP_CONCAT(color_name) color_name ,is_trim FROM t_style_main_accessories WHERE del_flag='0' GROUP BY style_color_id) tsma on (tsma.style_color_id = tsc.id ) left join t_basicsdatum_size tbs ON FIND_IN_SET(tbs.id,ts.size_ids) > 0 and tbs.hangtags = ts.default_size ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT distinct tsc.* from t_style_color tsc LEFT JOIN t_style_main_accessories tsma on (tsc.style_no = tsma.style_no and tsma.del_flag='0') WHERE tsma.style_color_id in
#{id}
and tsc.scm_send_flag <> '1'
UNION ALL
SELECT * from t_style_color tsc WHERE tsc.id in
#{id}
and tsc.scm_send_flag <> '1'

SELECT ts.year_name, ts.season_name, ts.brand_name, ts.band_code, ts.band_name, ts.prod_category1st, ts.prod_category1st_name, ts.prod_category, ts.prod_category_name, ts.devt_type, ts.devt_type_name, ts.sales_type, ts.sales_type_name, sum(IF(IFNULL(ts.design_marking_status, 0) = 0, 1, 0)) AS designCount, sum(IF(ts.design_marking_status = 1, 1, 0)) AS designCount1, sum(IF(ts.design_marking_status = 2, 1, 0)) AS designCount2, sum(IF(IFNULL(tsc.order_marking_status, 0) = 0, 1, 0)) AS orderCount, sum(IF(tsc.order_marking_status = 1, 1, 0)) AS orderCount1, sum(IF(tsc.order_marking_status = 2, 1, 0)) AS orderCount2, count(1) AS totalCount FROM t_style ts LEFT JOIN t_style_color tsc ON (ts.id = tsc.style_id AND tsc.del_flag = '0') ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY ts.year_name, ts.season_name, ts.brand_name, ts.band_code, ts.band_name, ts.prod_category1st, ts.prod_category1st_name, ts.prod_category, ts.prod_category_name, ts.devt_type, ts.devt_type_name, ts.sales_type, ts.sales_type_name

select * from (select t.style_id, t1.design_no, t.style_no as styleNo, IF(t1.designer != '', SUBSTRING_INDEX(t1.designer, ',', 1), '') as designer, t2.pattern_design_name as patternDesignName, t2.stitcher from t_style_color t INNER JOIN t_style t1 ON t.style_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_pattern_making t2 on t1.id = t2.style_id ORDER BY t2.create_date DESC) t where 1=1
and t.styleNo in
#{item}
GROUP BY t.style_id

select tsca.id, tsc.id styleColorId, ts.id styleId, tpp.id stylePricingId, ts.year, ts.year_name, ts.brand, ts.brand_name, ts.season, ts.season_name, concat(ts.year_name, ' ', ts.season_name, ' ', ts.brand_name) planningSeason, ts.prod_category_name, tsc.style_no, tsc.style_color_pic, tsca.outside_size_code outsideSizeCode, tsca.outside_color_name outsideColorName, tsca.outside_color_code outsideColorCode, tsc.color_name, tsc.color_code, ts.style_type, ts.style_type_name, ts.prod_category1st, ts.prod_category1st_name, ts.prod_category2nd, ts.prod_category2nd_name, tsca.size_code sizeCode, tbs.internal_size, ts.size_range, ts.size_range_name, concat(tsc.ware_code, tsc.color_code, tbs.sort) defaultBarCode, tsca.outside_barcode outsideBarcode, ts.devt_type, ts.devt_type_name, tsc.create_date, tsc.create_id, tsc.create_name, tsca.update_name, tsca.update_date, tsc.status as enableStatus , tsca.status sendStatus, ts.band_code, ts.band_name, ts.gender_name as genderType, tbs.hangtags, tsc.tag_price, tpp.control_plan_cost, SUBSTRING_INDEX(tsca.style_color_no, "-", 1) outsideStyleNo, tha.packaging_form, tha.packaging_form_code, tha.id hangTagId FROM t_style_color_agent tsca LEFT JOIN t_style_color tsc ON tsca.style_color_id = tsc.id AND tsc.del_flag = '0' left join t_style ts on ts.id = tsc.style_id and ts.del_flag = '0' left join t_pack_info tpi on ts.id = tpi.foreign_id and tpi.del_flag = '0' left join t_style_pricing tpp on tpi.id = tpp.pack_id and tpp.del_flag = '0' left join t_basicsdatum_size tbs ON tsca.size_id = tbs.code left join t_hang_tag tha on tha.bulk_style_no = tsc.style_no and tha.del_flag = '0' ${ew.customSqlSegment}
